jeggings.name: Jeggings
jeggings.description: They're leggings, but they look like jeans!

cargo_pants.name: Cargo Pants
cargo_pants.description: Cargo pants are perfect if you're looking for style AND utility.

high_waisted.name: High Waisted
high_waisted.description: Time hop back into the early 90's with some high waisted denim!

cargo_shorts.name: Cargo Shorts
cargo_shorts.description: Nothing like utility on a hot day.

bermuda.name: Bermuda Shorts
bermuda.description: Dem some realllly long shorts, girl.

amish.name: Amish Shirt
amish.description: So long, they might as well be pants!

body_con.name: Body Con
body_con.description: That skirt is toooo tight, did your mom let you walk out of the house lookin like that?!

summer.name: Summer Skirt
summer.description: Perfect on the beach or to chill around the house in.

v_neck.name: V-Neck
v_neck.description: Comes in many different degrees of deep. If you're feeling fiesty, go for the deepest of v's.

crew_neck.name: Crew Neck
crew_neck.description: Just your average, every day shirt!

graphic_tee.name: Graphic Tee
graphic_tee.description: This is the shirt you wear around to let people know you know your pop culture.

button_up.name: Button Up
button_up.description: If you happen to date someone of the same size as yourself, you could totes share button ups!

flowy.name: Flowy Blouse
flowy.description: Very light and breezy. Also too sheer sometimes.

flowy.name: Flowy Blouse
flowy.description: Very light and breezy. Also too sheer sometimes.

cut_off.name: Cut Off Sleeves
cut_off.description: The shirt you wear for all occasions: home, gym, school and sometimes prison.

spaghetti.name: Spaghetti Strap
spaghetti.description: Also known as a cami, and is a closet staple.

tank.name: Tank Top
tank.description: Nothing than a tank top on a hot summer day!
